patterns_discovered: Flexible component design with controlled and uncontrolled state modes
Dynamic styling based on NPS score category
Comprehensive error handling and submission state management
Separate concerns between main component and standalone wrapper
gotchas_discovered: Complex state management with local and prop-based state
Multiple nested callback functions for score and comment handling
Detailed styling logic for score buttons
Error handling and submission state tracking
recommendations: Consider extracting score button rendering into a separate component
Use TypeScript for better type safety in props and state
Add unit tests for score category and state management logic
Implement prop-types or TypeScript interfaces for component props
